wikipedia_page.main: Sir Percy Alfred Harris, 1st Baronet, PC (6 March 1876 – 28 June 1952) was a British Liberal Party politician. He was Liberal Chief Whip and Deputy Leader of the Liberal Parliamentary Party.

response: *Sir Percy Harris, 1st Baronet MP (1876–1952), Liberal Chief Whip (1935–1945)
